name: HaxeTool
description: Find in cache or download a specific version of Haxe and add it to the PATH
author: Andy Li <andy@onthewings.net>

inputs.name: versionSpec
inputs.label: Version spec
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version range or exact version of a Haxe version to use, using semver's version range syntax. [More information](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=2006180)

outputVariables.name: haxeLocation
outputVariables.description: The directory of the installed Haxe distribution. Use this in subsequent tasks to access this installation of Haxe.

messages.PrependPath: Prepending PATH environment variable with directory: %s
messages.ToolNotFoundMicrosoftHosted: If this is a Microsoft-hosted agent, check that this image supports side-by-side versions of %s at %s.
messages.ToolNotFoundSelfHosted: If this is a self-hosted agent, see how to configure side-by-side %s versions at %s.
messages.VersionNotFound: Version spec %s for architecture %s did not match any version in Agent.ToolsDirectory.
